pageContext.claim: “Caravans are coming up, they have a big one coming up now. I'm disappointed that Mexico is not stopping them. I mean, Mexico seems unfortunately powerless to stop them.”
pageContext.analysis: News reports indicate that this caravan is smaller than the caravans at the end of 2018. While Trump often highlights the caravans, they account for a fraction of the overall number of migrants who come into Mexico. The Mexican government has taken a number of steps to trim down the size of the caravans, including offering work permits and helping to assess asylum claims.
